creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: cranberry colored; open sides; multicolored stripes on side panels; center front and back has rows of dot-like designs in bright multicolors; floral ribbon trim on shoulders and around neckline with ties at each side; U-shaped embroidered panel around neckline on each side, trimmed with lace; two vertical green chain stitched zigzags on striped panels
title: Child's huipil
